page.title: Weapons and Turrets
page.descr: Names and descriptions of weapons and turrets
page.t: Assistant! I was able to reverse-engineer the Xenon weaponry and found ways to make it even more devastating. It is completely beyond me why the Xenon only ever repurposed their construction needles instead of more destructive bullets! With this version you should be able to wreak even more havoc amongst the Xenon. -Boso Ta
